# exerp-odin-cc-form



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute           | Description                                                                                                                                                                               | Type                  | Default     |
| ----------------- | ------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `isSingleUse`     | `is-single-use`     | Indicates if the payment method token generated by OdinPay.js should be treated as single-use (`true`) or intended for saving (`false`). Passed down from the facade. Defaults to `true`. | `boolean`             | `true`      |
| `odinPublicToken` | `odin-public-token` | The short-lived public token obtained from the ODIN backend, required to initialize the OdinPay.js library. Passed down from the facade.                                                  | `string \| undefined` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event                | Description                                                                                                                      | Type                                |
| -------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `odinErrorInternal`  | Fired when OdinPay.js returns an error during submission or if an internal setup error occurs. Contains the error message.       | `CustomEvent<OdinPayErrorPayload>`  |
| `odinSubmitInternal` | Fired when OdinPay.js successfully returns a payment method token after the user submits the form. Contains the paymentMethodId. | `CustomEvent<OdinPaySubmitPayload>` |
